display_preset_styles.comment: Display preset styles button on front-end?

logo_image.label: Logo image
logo_image.comment:
Allowed file types: png, gif, jpg
Not all browsers support all these formats!
Leave empty it will show the default.

logo_width.label: Logo width
logo_width.comment: Example: 250px. If leave empty it will be automatically resized.

logo_height.label: Logo height
logo_height.comment: Example: 100px. If leave empty it will be automatically resized.

favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.comment:
Allowed file types: ico, png, gif
Not all browsers support all these formats!
Leave empty it will show the default.

body_font_size.label: Body font-size
body_font_size.comment: Example: 12px or 1.1em or 75%. Leave empty it will be applied by default CSS file.

body_line_height.label: Body line height
body_line_height.comment: Example: 12px or 1.2em or 75%. Leave empty it will be applied by default CSS file.

custom_list_2.comment: Type the selector list, comma separator. Example: h1, h2, div.your_class

create_column_maintop1.label: Create column for blocks in Main Top 1 Area
create_column_maintop1.comment: Each block or widget in this structure block will be displayed as a column.

default_column_maintop1.label: Use default block column layout for Main Top 1 Area
default_column_maintop1.comment:
Choose Yes to display blocks or widgets in this structure block as columns with default Width.
Choose No to use bellow definition.

maintop1.label: Width definition for columns in Main Top 1 Area
maintop1.comment:
Number in percent unit. Example:
100; // 1 column will be 100% width.
50,50; // 2 columns, each will be 50% width.
33,33,33; // 3 columns, each will be 33% width.
25,25,25,25;
20,20,20,20,20;
